title: The Bitten Word's Sauteed Brussels Sprouts With Sriracha And Ca
summary: You can never have too many side dish recipes, so give The Bitten Word's Sauteed Brussels Sprouts With Srirachan And Can a try. This recipe serves 2 and costs $3.88 per serving. One serving contains 1280 calories, 34g of protein, and 120g of fat. If you have salt and pepper, chili garlic sauce, lemon juice, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. 19 people found this recipe to be delicious and satisfying. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 6 minutes. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, dairy free, and whole 30 diet. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 70%. This score is pretty good. Try The Bitten Word's Roasted Brussels Sprouts With Bacon And Apples, The Bitten Word's Slow-baked Honeycrisp Apples, and Soy and Sriracha Glazed Brussels Sprouts for similar recipes.
